H0.text: Nephritis is a condition, in humans, where which part of the body becomes inflamed. Pancreatic

H1.text: Nephritis is a condition, in humans, where which part of the body becomes inflamed. Hepatic

H2.text: Nephritis is a condition, in humans, where which part of the body becomes inflamed. Pulmonary

H3.text: Nephritis is a condition, in humans, where which part of the body becomes inflamed. Renal

A4.text: Nephritis is inflammation of the kidneys
